summary: The Learn and Serve America Reinvestment Act proposes a direct appropriation of $40 million for the Learn and Serve America program, along with funds for additional staff at the Corporation for National and Community Service. The bill expands eligibility for the program to include local educational agencies. It amends existing legislation related to allotments and grant awards, specifying how funds will be distributed in fiscal year 2026 and beyond, including a reservation for payments to the Bureau of Indian Affairs and competitive grants for state educational agencies. Furthermore, the bill amends several sections of the National and Community Service Act of 1990 to reflect the changes.
